00040 #ifndef _uitextbutton_cpp
00041 #define _uitextbutton_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "uitextbutton.h"
00044 #include "uilayer.h"
00045 #include "uimanager.h"
00046 #include "internalGorilla.h.cpp"
00047 
00048 namespace phys
00049 {
00050     namespace UI
00051     {
00052         TextButton::TextButton(ConstString& name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, const Whole Glyph, String Text, UILayer* Layer)
00053             : Button(name,Position,Size,Layer)
00054         {
00055             IsText = true;
00056             GorillaButton = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->createCaption(Glyph,GorillaRectangle->left(),GorillaRectangle->top(),Text);
00057             GorillaButton->size(GorillaRectangle->width(),GorillaRectangle->height());
00058             GorillaButton->background(Ogre::ColourValue(0,0,0,0));
00059             GorillaButton->align(Gorilla::TextAlign_Centre);
00060             GorillaButton->vertical_align(Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Middle);
00061         }
00062 
00063         TextButton::~TextButton()
00064         {
00065             Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->destroyCaption(GorillaButton);
00066         }
00067 
00068         void TextButton::SetVisible(bool Visible)
00069         {
00070             GorillaRectangle->SetVisible(Visible);
00071             GorillaButton->SetVisible(Visible);
00072         }
00073 
00074         bool TextButton::IsVisible()
00075         {
00076             return GorillaRectangle->IsVisible();
00077         }
00078 
00079         void TextButton::Show()
00080         {
00081             GorillaRectangle->Show();
00082             GorillaButton->Show();
00083         }
00084 
00085         void TextButton::Hide()
00086         {
00087             GorillaRectangle->Hide();
00088             GorillaButton->Hide();
00089         }
00090 
00091         void TextButton::SetText(ConstString& Text)
00092         {
00093             GorillaButton->text(Text);
00094         }
00095 
00096         String TextButton::GetText()
00097         {
00098             return GorillaButton->text();
00099         }
00100 
00101         void TextButton::HorizontallyAlign(UI::TextHorizontalAlign Align)
00102         {
00103             Gorilla::TextAlignment HA;
00104             switch (Align)
00105             {
00106                 case UI::Txt_Left:
00107                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Left;
00108                     break;
00109                 case UI::Txt_Right:
00110                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Right;
00111                     break;
00112                 case UI::Txt_Middle:
00113                     HA = Gorilla::TextAlign_Centre;
00114                     break;
00115                 default:
00116                     return;
00117             }
00118             GorillaButton->align(HA);
00119         }
00120 
00121         void TextButton::VerticallyAlign(UI::TextVerticalAlign Align)
00122         {
00123             Gorilla::VerticalAlignment VA;
00124             switch (Align)
00125             {
00126                 case UI::Txt_Top:
00127                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Top;
00128                     break;
00129                 case UI::Txt_Bottom:
00130                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Bottom;
00131                     break;
00132                 case UI::Txt_Center:
00133                     VA = Gorilla::VerticalAlign_Middle;
00134                     break;
00135                 default:
00136                     return;
00137             }
00138             GorillaButton->vertical_align(VA);
00139         }
00140 
00141         void TextButton::SetPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00142         {
00143             RelPosition = Position;
00144             Vector2 CurrDim = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00145             GorillaButton->left(CurrDim.X * RelPosition.X);
00146             GorillaButton->top(CurrDim.Y * RelPosition.Y);
00147             GorillaRectangle->left(CurrDim.X * RelPosition.X);
00148             GorillaRectangle->top(CurrDim.Y * RelPosition.Y);
00149         }
00150 
00151         Vector2 TextButton::GetPosition()
00152         {
00153             return RelPosition;
00154         }
00155 
00156         void TextButton::SetActualPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00157         {
00158             GorillaButton->left(Position.X);
00159             GorillaButton->top(Position.Y);
00160             GorillaRectangle->left(Position.X);
00161             GorillaRectangle->top(Position.Y);
00162         }
00163 
00164         Vector2 TextButton::GetActualPosition()
00165         {
00166             Vector2 Pos(GorillaButton->left(), GorillaButton->top());
00167             return Pos;
00168         }
00169 
00170         void TextButton::SetSize(const Vector2 Size)
00171         {
00172             RelSize = Size;
00173             Vector2 CurrDim = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00174             GorillaButton->left(CurrDim.X * RelSize.X);
00175             GorillaButton->top(CurrDim.Y * RelSize.Y);
00176             GorillaRectangle->left(CurrDim.X * RelSize.X);
00177             GorillaRectangle->top(CurrDim.Y * RelSize.Y);
00178         }
00179 
00180         Vector2 TextButton::GetSize()
00181         {
00182             return RelSize;
00183         }
00184 
00185         void TextButton::SetActualSize(const Vector2 Size)
00186         {
00187             GorillaButton->width(Size.X);
00188             GorillaButton->height(Size.Y);
00189             GorillaRectangle->width(Size.X);
00190             GorillaRectangle->height(Size.Y);
00191         }
00192 
00193         Vector2 TextButton::GetActualSize()
00194         {
00195             Vector2 Pos(GorillaButton->width(), GorillaButton->height());
00196             return Pos;
00197         }
00198 
00199         void TextButton::SetRenderPriority(UI::RenderPriority Priority)
00200         {
00201             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP;
00202             switch(Priority)
00203             {
00204                 case UI::RP_Low:
00205                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Low;
00206                     break;
00207                 case UI::RP_Medium:
00208                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Medium;
00209                     break;
00210                 case UI::RP_High:
00211                     RP = Gorilla::RP_High;
00212                     break;
00213                 default:
00214                     break;
00215             }
00216             GorillaButton->RenderPriority(RP);
00217             GorillaRectangle->RenderPriority(RP);
00218         }
00219 
00220         UI::RenderPriority TextButton::GetRenderPriority()
00221         {
00222             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP = this->GorillaRectangle->RenderPriority();
00223             switch(RP)
00224             {
00225                 case Gorilla::RP_Low:
00226                     return UI::RP_Low;
00227                     break;
00228                 case Gorilla::RP_Medium:
00229                     return UI::RP_Medium;
00230                     break;
00231                 case Gorilla::RP_High:
00232                     return UI::RP_High;
00233                     break;
00234                 default:
00235                     break;
00236             }
00237             return UI::RP_Medium;
00238         }
00239     }
00240 }

00242 #endif
